name: Big Shot Swish
storyline:
Swish is a hot basketball arcade game that anybody can enjoy! Shoot hoops and compete head-to-head to crush opponents and become the next basketball star!

Mobile esports for everyone. Show off your basketball shooting Skillz and play for real cash with Swish Real Money Gaming.

Challenge people around the world to a shoot-out with Skillz, a competition platform complete with leaderboards, trophies, cash or virtual currency prizes, and an amazing loyalty program that rewards you just for playing! Skillz: eSports for Everyone

Features
• Skillz Multiplayer platform - Play for cash prizes against other players
• Realistic, Intuitive Basketball Shootout!
• Rewardable Leaderboards and Frequent Player System!
• Unlock Trophies and get CASH Rewards!
• Authentic Gameplay.
